thread.title: Watch: Lion cub vs lioness' tail
thread.title_full: Watch: Lion cub vs lioness' tail

author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Lion cub vs lioness' tail
text:
Watch: Lion cub vs lioness' tail Article By: Megan Ellis Tue, 20 Oct 2015 3:45 PM Share Your Email Credit: SunDestinations/YouTube 
This video will fill up your cuteness quota for the day: a lion cub versus a lioness' tail. 
Footage of the adorable face off was taken by Kevin MacLaughlin and uploaded to the SunDestinations YouTube channel. 
The cub is part of the Ross Breakaway pride near the nThambo Tree Camp. 
The small cub can be seen chewing on the lionness' tail. While she flicks it away, the cub does not give up. 
However the lioness eventually moves away - she's not his mother, so she doesn't have the patience for his antics. 
Does this mean the lion cub won the 'battle'? 
Watch the adorable video below: Read More
